description: Dart source file for the NotificationsScreen widget in a Flutter application. It defines a stateful widget that displays notifications, allows filtering, and provides interaction options such as marking notifications as read, dismissing, and viewing details.

classes.name: NotificationsScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays a list of notifications with filtering and interaction options.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the TabController and loads notifications on widget creation.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the TabController when the widget is destroyed.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the notifications screen, including AppBar, notification list, and FAB.

methods.name: _buildNotificationsList
methods.description: Constructs the list view of notifications based on filtering parameters.

methods.name: _buildNotificationCard
methods.description: Creates a card widget representing an individual notification with interaction options.

methods.name: _getTypeColor
methods.description: Returns a color associated with a notification type.

methods.name: _getTypeIcon
methods.description: Returns an icon associated with a notification type.

methods.name: _showNotificationDetails
methods.description: Displays a dialog with detailed information about a notification.

methods.name: _showAddNotificationDialog
methods.description: Shows a placeholder SnackBar indicating where add notification functionality would go.
